amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to terminate the ITS program advisory committee.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1062 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1062 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cortez Masto to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6314) To prohibit the use of funds to terminate the ITS program advisory committee.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1062 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1062 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cortez Masto to Amendment SA 948.
